website_summaries.verdict: Use this heavy-duty fire ring alone or pair it with pavers for a more finished look.
pros: Finished with a high-temperature paint to protect against the elements
Use aboveground or in the ground, alone or with bricks and pavers
cons: Poor packaging leads some to arrive with bent edges

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in our pit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in our pit. People that complain about the paint flaking, come on man it's a fire pit. Fires burn paint. I would buy it again. Looks and functions perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mills

customer_reviews.title: Could take the heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, inverted the top one since my fire pit was 24" high. I placed a row of fire bricks between the lips of the rings to allow air to flow in to help the fire burn well. I use my fire pit to burn the fallen branches and small trees, sometimes keeping the fire burning for days at a time. After a couple of years doing this, my EP Henry wall stones were taking a serious beating. These rings will protect them, hopefully for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect well packaged and solid product!! You get what you pay for 110%!
customer_reviews.text: Baddass product!!! Picture explains how amazing this is all the way around! Also, ignore any negative review you see about shipping issues because they changed the way they package this now. It is completely wrapped up protecting all corners with strong cardboard caps on all corners and it is boxed up nice and tight. Other than this thing falling out of an airplane during shipment, this thing will not come damaged in any way!! Love it!!! Great great addition to our backyard. Thank you for such an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: punkybear

customer_reviews.title: Tips bent from bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with other reviews. Packaging was awful. The metal pierced through the package and the tips of the rings were bent. You'd think with all the reviews mentioning this the manufacturer would care enough to fix the issue. This issue also caused some of the black coating to expose the bare metal. Hopefully that doesn't cause corrosion. Assembly was easy but top rim seams didnt all fit together the same. I had to bend the damaged tips to flatten them with coated pliers. I paid extra for this item hoping for better quality. We will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: BobP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Sturdy, well made. Glad I got this one instead of others where the screws prevent the lip from fitting flush onto the paver surface. This one fits flush. I love my DIY firepit.
customer_reviews.author: Silvergirl

customer_reviews.title: Stand up high quality fire ring!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I’ve made to our outdoor entertainment.... first fire tonight and it was so much fun and the dimensions were spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rim is only spot welded!
customer_reviews.text: Four pieces, pretty easy to put together, but the rim was not fully attached on one of the pieces- it is only spot welded and the curve of the rim didn't fully line up with the inside. It is only a liner for me as I used curved bricks to create firepit- still, not happy about the quality for the price. One extra screw was included and a piece of paper with the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: love teaching!

customer_reviews.title: Love our pit
customer_reviews.text: We built this a week ago and love it. We bought wall blocks from home depot that were 11 inches x 6.75 by 4 inches high. We had to knock the lip off the back so they would stack without being terraced. It took 13 blocks per row. Our only issue was that the pit lip was bent a little but a rubber mallet fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Charity R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick to rust but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This fire ring came quickly and assembled quickly without needing to look for instructions. Two stacks of blocks reached the top of the fire pit ring. It looked nice but we decided to add a third layer. Major downfall, the fire pit ring began rusting in less than two weeks (was husband's birthday gift.) When it needs replaced, I will probably seek out a reputable company in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Imffh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Purchased on recommendation from a DIY YouTuber. Super easy to assemble, did it myself in less than 10 minutes. Heavy duty. I took an extra precaution and got some high heat engine paint from Auto Zone, before setting it in, just to delay the onset of rust. It’s been in for a few weeks now and I’m super happy with it. Really polished off DIY the build nicely.
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: As expected, but came in poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and put it together (haven't actually had a fire in it yet). As others have mentioned, the packaging was not good. It was single boxed and the edges of the ring had ripped through the box on two sides. The exposed edges were scratched. The ring was easy to assemble and seemed sturdy when assembled. The metal is thin enough that we plan to put a stone cap over the edges of the ring (we've installed it in an existing stone firepit).
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Bonfires here we come!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this came out. We purchased the ring to go inside a cottage block ring (3 stones high) and it worked great. The lip on the outside helps stabilize the ring and keep it study on the rest of the construction. The width of the hole is perfect for a backyard fire pit and we get 6 lawn chairs around the ring comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Olivas-Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Just what the fire pit ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the price as compared to others. It comes in 3 sections that need assembled and the top joints were the sections meet don't meet fully. But the steel was solid and after all, it's a fire pit. So...a good buy unless you're looking to spend more money on a for a more expensive solution.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth 101

customer_reviews.title: Bad fire ring, cheap, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: It came in a box that was damaged. The FireRing was not heavy duty or very well built. It was damaged and bent. It did not come with any screws or assembly parts. I had to go to the hardware store to get the parts to finish and make it right. The fire ring was completely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no screws provided to assemble, the sides of the fire pit were banged up. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMakeup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was inserted into an area we dug out & lined with bricks. It worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Judith M Davari-Nejad

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, dimensions seem a bit off though
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, seems very durable. Just be aware the size might not be exactly as advertised. We ordered the 39" diameter and had already started constructing our pit. I made ours 39.5" figuring better safe to leave a little extra room, and when it arrived I would say the diameter was closer to 40" and it took some finagling to get it into the already mortared pit. Aside from that though it seems like a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Scott

customer_reviews.title: Rusted before we had it a year!
customer_reviews.text: DIY’d a fire pit using this ring. I was impressed with the reviews so took a chance. It was easy to assemble and seemed sturdy enough. The fire pit liner was purchased it in August and it is currently April. I’m shocked and EXTREMELY disappointed with how much it has rusted. The fire pit was protected over the winter with a cover I bought from Amazon. Guess it’s back to the drawing board for me. If you are considering this ring, KEEP LOOKING!
customer_reviews.author: wagstaff

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with a couple of holes in the box - which was noted by others. However, that’s not a surprise considering that these are very study pieces of metal being delivered in a box. This item is a very good buy for the money - sturdy, easy to assemble, and just right if you’re making a fire pit. I would recommend this product. It may be a little pricier than the others, but it is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be well made. Assembly took as little as 15 minutes. Purchased fire pit stone from local home improvement. Overall cost much less than buying a complete kit.
customer_reviews.author: GLABSr

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on the day I needed it for firepit night ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on the day I needed it for firepit night after building new stone firepit. Fit perfectly. One corner was a little bent, but no big deal. First use: paint started to peel off from the heat Next day: ring was starting to rust. I will probably sand it down and hit it with some high-heat paint, but I shouldn't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonchef

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This item came in great shape. It assembled very easily and is pretty sturdy. So far so good. I will let you know as time goes on how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade from the bowl style insert we had prior. It would collect water and would rust out the bottom. We don't have that issue with this one and therefore It will last longer. Just get yourself some lava rocks to line the bottom of the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to assemble It fits perfectly and I get a lot of compliments from my family on how nice it looks
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: It seems great but rusting in less then a month
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a month and it’s rusting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Helm

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy and thin material. We buried it hoping for a better chance of survival.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Giamichael

customer_reviews.title: Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Sturdy steel and a snap to piece together
customer_reviews.author: FORFB

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say for a fire pit rim. Does it's job. Have had mine for several weeks (through several fires and rain storms) now and no problems with rusting or anything which I was expecting based on some of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good product will find out more after tested with heat...👍
customer_reviews.author: Shivninder

customer_reviews.title: Love my fire ring
customer_reviews.text: Love the ring but after day 1 we saw rust on the top lip. Don’t think it will affect the ring but was hoping not to have rust this quick. A little pricey but we’ve used it for the last few nights and love it. We did get a grate to help with the air flow and now it works even better.
customer_reviews.author: lisa blachura

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Love it. Easy to put together and sturdy! Also bought the domed screen for my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: We love this ring! Enjoying our fire and making s’mores!
customer_reviews.text: We love this ring! Enjoying our fire and making s’mores! Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Nice design to build around by bricks.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. You can build a nice pit by bricks around it. Nicely fit in there.
customer_reviews.author: Diaa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am retired and took me a bit to put together as I am retired. Got it done and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at first. Rusted out after one fire.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, fit perfectly, and looked great once installed. Unfortunately almost the entire thing rusted after one medium sized fire. I cannot recommend this product for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the ring in a fire pit build of versa lock blocks for 5 months through the winter. Used it 1 time in October and it is already peeling and rusting. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: que

customer_reviews.title: Rusts
customer_reviews.text: This product began to rust after the first use. I would not recommend this fire ring to anyone. The picture shows what it looks like after 3 fires. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Cope

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very easy to install. Comes down lower into the pit then the regular store bought ones. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Shopping diva

customer_reviews.title: Ring was larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: The ring was actually larger than 30 inches. We were anticipating being able to drop it right in and it was too large by a bit so we had to disassemble one joint to make the ring fit.
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Horrible dimensions
customer_reviews.text: This is larger then what it said and cannot fit into my space! My contractor cannot use this and I'm upset that the dimension are soo off!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, on time delivery, and a beat up box.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. It arrived a little banged up due to P-poor packaging. That was reported in most reviews. It went together easily, and the few small dents won't hurt its functionality or looks. We just paved our driveway with pavers, and the excess pavers were used to build the fire pit around, and supporting the fire ring. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Herb J Karkheck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Firepit ring
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice size and the metal is sturdy - the only issue is since I purchased the largest ring ( 36 inches) can’t purchase any fire pit kit ( usually for 34 inches) - have to find the proper pavers to fit the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Zorba

customer_reviews.title: It is a POOR VALUE given the cost
customer_reviews.text: The product overall is OK. It is a POOR VALUE given the cost. I expected the steel to be much thicker and it is thicker on other units but not one this size. I'm having to keep a lot of coatings on it to keep it from rusting especially since the metal is so thin....
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: perfect liner
customer_reviews.text: heavier gauge metal than many similar products. easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: cjaap

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the 30" Dome Spark Screen - it's too small
customer_reviews.text: I like it, however, if you get the 30" Pit.... DO NOT get the 30" Dome Spark Screen..... the 30" Spark Screen is too small for the 30" Pit and will fall in... you'll need to get the 36" Dome Spark Screen
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hockaday

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with the bolts to connect each piece. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the bolts to connect each piece. We installed inside landscaping stones so this hasnt been a material issue. It definitely does have the rust problem as stated by others, but it's a firepit...so I don't see the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Product
customer_reviews.text: Should have known... Didn’t realize it was made in China and the quality shows. The welding tack is very poor quality - arrived broke, due to the wielding tacks and 3 days late. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a mold to form the outside of the fire pit!! Excellent choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Trofe

customer_reviews.title: Good Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: This was not as heavy duty as I have seen but was in good shape when it was delivered and works well. It fit my fire pit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only a couple of fires but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but not a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: If this product was non-ferrous, it may be worth $200 but, as it is I’m mad at myself for paying that much! Also it sustained minor damage in shipment. Careless handling and poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not in one piece
customer_reviews.text: Product in pieces and the box looks like it went through hell. Nothing like expectex.
customer_reviews.author: Tacticalx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits great, will see how long it last,it seams pretty heavy
customer_reviews.author: trapper

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than most fire rings
customer_reviews.text: Love the size! Its a little bigger than the average fire ring. It make a perfect marshmallow and fireside chat. Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Axelsson

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!  Looks sharp!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Not sure how it will hold up for the long haul, but it looks awesome. Fast delivery, easy to assemble. Fairly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well built and good quality. Wait and see
customer_reviews.author: Allen M

customer_reviews.title: OK but not heavy duty at all.
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than expected and light weight. Made in China and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: EKH

customer_reviews.title: Great liner
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our new firepit, exactly what we needed. Easy to assemble, nice and sturdy. Cannot wait to have our first fire this weekend! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Foust

customer_reviews.title: Comes in pieces and does not make a solid ring
customer_reviews.text: The parts came scraped and dented. The parts do not fit well together but gaps are inevitable between the 90 degree sections. Made out of such a thin metal and painted thinly so I’m wondering how well it will withstand fire. Completely disappointed of the look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit ring insert
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....we will have to wait and see if this ring lasts!!! Very heavy so I'm thinking it will have been a good purchase...
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a five if the paint hadn't been dinged in a couple of places. In the long run that will not impact the use. I wouldn't hesitate ro buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Arnall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as I needed it to be. It went all the way down inside the well. Perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Mawyki

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit ring
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. I believe it was overpriced for what you get. Not that much to it. Looks good though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Man

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Very sturdy and has a tall height. Does exactly what it's supposed to do. The only thing That would have made this perfect is if it had some kind of hook or something to help open and close it over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Topcoat already started to peel and rust is already appearing After only two times of use
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Your product is nice you have to make sure you do reinforce it with bricks will work good
customer_reviews.author: Post381org

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit is really nice. Heavy duty construction and exactly what I had hoped for! Looked in various places and nothing beats the quality of Sunny daze!!! Very very pleased! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Dittmer

customer_reviews.title: I RECEIVED THIS ITEM ON TIME, BUT WITH SLIGHT ...
customer_reviews.text: I RECEIVED THIS ITEM ON TIME, BUT WITH SLIGHT DAMAGE. FOUR OUT OF EIGHT CHEAP SCREWS WERE MISSING, AND THE HOLES WOULD NOT ALIGN. THE PRODUCT IS CHEAPLY MADE AND NOT WORTH THE PRICE. IT SHOULD BE SELLING FOR ABOUT $45.00 OR LESS.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT H HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a thicker gauge.
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I hoped, thus expensive. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: dugger

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my fire pit---just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my fire pit---just the right size. Easy to assemble and of good quality. A little pricey, but you get what you pay for!!! I recommend it for any fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: robwill

customer_reviews.title: Good solid fire pit rain heavy duty just what I was looking for easy assembly would recommend it to anyone good price
customer_reviews.text: Good solid fire pit rain heavy duty just what I was looking for easy assembly would recommend it to anyone good price
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P Adduci

customer_reviews.title: My disappointment was that the finished lip was not smooth and ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a box with all the parts. My disappointment was that the finished lip was not smooth and continuous as you have to bolt the sections together. I also question whether the screws and nuts are stainless steel? If not they will most likely rot out over the next 24 months.
customer_reviews.author: andrew h.

customer_reviews.title: Good finish on a rock fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: Went together well and materials are OK but wish it was a bit thicker. Shipping was 5 star. Looks great on new brick fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely provides structure and the perfect finishing touch to my fire pit and patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled with stones around it the unit was great. This took a bit of work to make it fit together. Parts matched up but instructions were a full page of useless info with only a tiny picture to see how it should be assembled. In the end we got it to work without much effort but be sure to have a large open space with a soft surface for building. It looks great in backyard and would buy one again, however a bit pricey for what it took. I could have bought an entire kit at a home improvement store for the retail price of this one
customer_reviews.author: Jabbear

customer_reviews.title: No bottom - sturdy steel
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more of a bowl (with a bottom) than a ring. This is better because it is sturdier steel and probably won't rust out like the bird bath style one did.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Semroska

customer_reviews.title: Added some brick around the sides and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Added some brick around the sides and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We just finished installing it. Waiting for the wind to die down, so we can build our first fire!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Completely underwhelmed with the quality of this product. It didn't come with the hardware to put it together...so we had to go to our local hardware store to buy additional parts. I would not recommend-
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J McKinney

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice fire ring
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fire ring. The packaging this item comes in is horrible. It was beat up and I was afraid to open it thinking it might be damaged. The box was damaged and re-taped. This item is fairly heavy and needs a much thinker box to be transported in. When I did open it, the ring was find and seemed to escape any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Linhares

customer_reviews.title: Firepit Rim
customer_reviews.text: This rim was exactly what I was hoping for. It arrived in a timely manner and was easy to assemble and is now ready for our 1st pit fire this weekend. Papa Snow
customer_reviews.author: Papa Snow

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Didn't take long to start rusting but my husband doesn't cover it like he should. I would definitely recommend covering it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy from IN

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Using some Home Depot retaining wall cast concrete blocks, caps, and some elbow grease made a excellent fire pit. You need to pay close attention to make the first layer of blocks level.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty rim. Paint is peeling a little after a couple uses so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Johnboy4441

customer_reviews.title: Ring of Fire
customer_reviews.text: Went together with ease and works and looks like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Humerickhouse

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our fire pit right outside our home, easy to put in and works great!
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to Your Fire Pit.
customer_reviews.text: This ring finished off my fire pit project and gave it a professionally-installed look.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O'Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It could a bit larger gauge steel, but it's well made
customer_reviews.author: G. Ludlam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The measurements weren't as we thought. It did work out but could of been a little larger
customer_reviews.author: Kim stevenson

customer_reviews.title: This was well worth the money! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. Hope it doesnt rust but looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth K.

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for and assembled relatively easily. As others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: What we were looking for and assembled relatively easily. As others have mentioned, it rusted nearly immediately. I sanded it with steel wool, then sprayed with high heat paint. Time will tell how well it holds up, but looks like new again for now.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It is just OK. Seems to be powder coated with heavy duty coating. I seen others pictures that have rust and peeling paint. I will eventually follow up with pics in a few months. I wanted to buy this to give the new fire pit a 'finished' look. Although it does finish nicely, it is rather flimsy compared to a solid piece of metal. This one is into 4 pieces and bolts together. I bough lock washers separate to try and keep it from coming loose. For $100 its not much but does the job. Kind of one of those items I feel will have to be replaced often to keep it new look. Time will tell. Pics to follow.
customer_reviews.author: CalebBrian

customer_reviews.title: After repairs this turned out to be a nice insert.
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a very nice insert. HOWEVER, one of the 4 sections was not machined properly and didn't fit without overlapping two of the other sections. Additionally it only had a light coat of paint and was not finished like the other 3 sections. Fortunately a little work with the angle grinder I was able to finish the machine work so all sections fit properly. A can of high heat paint over all and its like it should have been to begin with. To others comments I've seen no rust or peeling of the paint. It's been outside in the rain and sprinkler prior to that and shows no sign of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy and it worked really well
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was broken on arrival but the item was not damaged. Assembly was easy and it worked really well. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's a steel ring with hi temp spray paint. Already rusting and peeling after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Should work well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, easy to assemble. Slightly larger diameter than advertised (30").
customer_reviews.author: david g

customer_reviews.title: major bummer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it did not Come with any hardware to stay together. Then after the very first fire it look rusted and discolored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We received our fire ring with a broken weld on ...
customer_reviews.text: We received our fire ring with a broken weld on the top rim. Luckily, my step-son was able to weld it back so we did not have to return it. For someone who doesn't know how to weld they would have had to return it as it was unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all good works great
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has same complaint. Box came in crazy beat up.Box within a box. No damage,all good works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kinger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Metal material is sturdy but it does have some play.
customer_reviews.author: MK

product_meta.title: Sunnydaze Fire Pit Ring/Liner - Heavy Duty DIY Above or In-Ground Outdoor Backyard Wood Burning Bonfire Insert Kit - 36-Inch Outer/30-Inch Inner Diameter
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR FIREPIT INSERT DIMENSIONS: 30 inch inside diameter x 36 inch outside diameter x 10 inch tall, weighs 30 pounds
GOOD QUALITY: Made of sturdy 2mm thick steel metal and finished with a high temperature paint to ensure long lasting quality and functionality for all weather types.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: 4-piece fireplace kit assembles in minutes, giving you more time to for cooking, or just burning a beautiful fire in your backyard (NOTE: there is no bottom to this fire pit liner)

ADD A PERSONAL TOUCH: Can be used as a in-ground fire pit liner rim or above-ground fire pit ring for the yard or campfire; You can also get creative and add decorative landscape blocks or brick around the steel ring for an addition to the patio (NOTE: Bricks not included)
WORRY-FREE PURCHASING: Sunnydaze Decor backs its firepits and rings with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty
